title: Joe Biden, China And G20 Leaders Back ‘Swift’ Game-Changing Crypto Price Rules For $1 Trillion Bitcoin, Ethereum, BNB And XRP Market
author: Billy Bambrough
description: U.S. president Joe Biden and leaders of other G20 member nations have endorsed the radical, game-changing crypto regulation recommendations of the global Financial Stability Board (FSB)...

title: Binance CEO Reveals When Next Crypto Price Bull Run Could Hit After $27 Trillion Bitcoin, Ethereum, BNB And XRP Bombshell
author: Billy Bambrough
description: Changpeng "CZ" Zhao has issued a 2025 crypto bull run price prediction—dismissing the "threat" to Binance from the likes of BlackRock and other Wall Street giants...

title: Crypto Usage Rises Across Argentina, Despite The Anti-Crypto IMF Deal
author: Javier Bastardo
description: Argentina has troubles with its IMF debt, but their openness to restrictive crypto policies might be helping them to regoneciate the deal.

title: FSB And IMF Caution Against Blanket Crypto Bans In Collaborative Report
author: Steve Larsen
description: Last week, the International Monetary Fund and the Financial Stability Board published a joint report advising against implementing blanket bans on crypto-asset activi...

title: Leak Reveals ‘Enormous’ China Earthquake Could Be About To Hit The Price Of Bitcoin, Ethereum, BNB, XRP, Cardano, Dogecoin, Polygon And Solana
author: Billy Bambrough
description: The chief executive of the stablecoin issuer Circle, Jeremy Allaire, who oversees the $28 billion USDC stablecoin, has said he sees "enormous demand" for digital assets in emerging markets, with China and Asia at  the "center"...

title: When The CBDC Revolution Comes, It Won’t Be On The Blockchain
author: David G.W. Birch
description: The Deputy Governor of the Bank of England, Jon Cunliffe, said that any proposed digital pound would likely be managed through some sort of account rather than working like coins or banknotes. I think he's spot on: Electronic fiat doesn't need the blockchain or "smart" "contracts."

title: IMF Suddenly Flips On Crypto As Wall Street Fuels A $200 Billion Bitcoin, Ethereum And Crypto Price Rally
author: Billy Bambrough
description: The International Monetary Fund (IMF) has suddenly softened its previous attitude toward crypto bans, warning they "may not be effective"...

title: Follow The Yellow BRIC Road (To A New Digital Reserve Currency?)
author: David G.W. Birch
description: Monetary commentator Charlie Crowson recently said that what is perhaps surprising is not that the classical gold standard ended but that it lasted as long as it did. When it comes to digital gold, I think tokens are great but that does not mean there will be a digital gold standard.

title: Coinbase Suddenly Surges After Reports Suggest SEC Is Poised To Make A Game-Changing Decision That Could Play Havoc With The Price Of Bitcoin, Ethereum, BNB And XRP
author: Billy Bambrough
description: Analysts at the brokerage Bernstein have said they think the probability a U.S. spot bitcoin ETF will be approved is fairly high, calling the SEC's opposition to a spot bitcoin ETF hard to hold...

title: Bitcoin Trailblazer Raises Capital To Create Interplanetary Cryptocurrency
author: Michael del Castillo
description: LedgerX founding CEO Paul Chou is building on the sale of the company he created to FTX by creating a new kind of cryptocurrency, Foundation Coin, that can be spent on Earth, the Moon, Mars and beyond.

title: The “Minsky Moment” Drags On: The Financial Instability Hypothesis And Its Lessons
author: Vipin Bharathan
description: Stability breeds Instability. Instability can fell the mightiest of the beasts in the economic jungle. Minsky's prescription to counter the wild swings.

title: CBDCs Are Bigger Than Politics
author: Norbert Michel
description: Central bank digital currencies (CBDCs) are all the rage. In the same two week span, the IMF held a CBDC forum, and two 2024 presidential candidates came out against CBDCs. Recent NY Times stories dismissing Ron DeSantis's comments on CBDCs as pure politics badly miss the mark.

title: Bitcoin Survived SVB And Silvergate Bank Fails; It Will Survive First Republic’s, Too
author: Kenneth Rapoza
description: Over a one-month period beginning March 13, when Silvergate, Signature Bank and Silicon Valley Bank all folded, the bitcoin price has gone up by 25%, beating traditional financial stocks. Bitcoin haters in government and traditional banking have their work cut out for them.

title: These 3 Countries Explain Why The IMF Stance On Bitcoin Changed
author: Javier Bastardo
description: IMF changed their anti-crypto stance in early june and these 3 countries might be influencing it due to their adoption.

title: Why This Crypto Hedge Fund Is Ignoring ‘Buy Signals’ And Prefers To Stay In Cash For Now
author: Steven Ehrlich
description: Quant fund Strix Leviathan is planning to stay liquid and on the sidelines until it is comfortable that contagion has run its course and the market has a new clear direction.

title: A Conversation On CBDCs, With Jamiel Sheikh, Of CBDC Think Tank
author: Vipin Bharathan
description: A conversation with Jamiel Sheikh of the CBDC Think Tank

title: One Year After Russia Mega Sanctions, Senate Asks ‘Can We Do Same To China?’
author: Kenneth Rapoza
description: At a Senate Banking Committee hearing on Feb. 28, many lament America's inability to sanction China like Russia.

title: The IMF Climate Coin Revisited (2/3)
author: Frank Van Gansbeke
description: In January 2021, I published an article on the urgency for an IMF Climate stablecoin that would offer incentives to nations to decarbonize their economy within the context of the 2015 Paris Treaty. The solution I offered needs an update. This is the second article in a series of three.

title: Inflation Protests Span Sri Lanka, Albania, Argentina, Panama, Kenya, Ghana - How Long Before They Hit The United States?
author: Rufas Kamau
description: Sri Lanka is not the only country where household budgets are stretched to the breaking point.

title: JPMorgan Readies Trillion Dollar Crypto Bazooka As Celsius Crisis Fuels Huge Bitcoin And Ethereum Price Crash—CryptoCodex
author: Billy Bambrough
description: The following is an excerpt from the daily CryptoCodex email newsletter. Sign up now for free here...

title: Three Reasons Why We Must Have More Female Founders In The Crypto Industry
author: Roselyne Wanjiru
description: Undoubtedly, the budding crypto industry is as volatile as it is full of opportunities. We're still at 5% of female founders and 21% female crypto owners; what happens when this number goes up?

title: Facebook Parent Meta Shares Fall After Company Warns Of ‘Weak Advertising Demand’
author: Sergei Klebnikov
description: Some analysts warn that Meta faces an “Everest-like uphill battle ahead.”

title: ‘Others Could Fail’—IMF Issues Stark Crypto Warning After Terra Luna-Led Crash Wiped $2 Trillion From Bitcoin, Ethereum And Crypto Market Price
author: Billy Bambrough
description: As the shockwaves from the collapse of the terraUSD stablecoin and its support cryptocurrency luna continue to be felt, the International Monetary Fund (IMF) has warned "there are others that could fail"...
